description: An extension for describing images by utilizing recent advances in AI technology. Press NVDA+Control+I to get a description of an object or selected file in Explorer, if you press twice quickly, a virtual viewer will open.

translations.description: Lisäosa, joka kuvailee kuvia tekoälyn viimeaikaista kehitystä hyödyntäen. Paina NVDA+Ctrl+I saadaksesi kuvauksen objektista tai Resurssienhallinnassa valittuna olevasta tiedostosta. Kahdesti painettaessa kuvaus avataan erilliseen ikkunaan.

An extension for describing images by utilizing recent advances in AI technology. Press NVDA+Control+I to get a description of an object or selected file in Explorer, if you press twice quickly, a virtual viewer will open.

Egy bővítmény, amely leírást készít az aktuális objektum vizuális megjelenéséről,
kétszeri gyors megnyomásra egy virtuális nézegető nyílik meg.

Um complemento para descrever imagens usando os recentes avanços da Inteligência Artificial; Pressione NVDA+Control+I para obter uma descrição de um objeto ou arquivo selecionado no Explorer, se você pressionar duas vezes rapidamente, um visualizador virtual irá abrir.

An extension for describing images by utilizing recent advances in AI technology. Press NVDA+Control+I to get a description of an object or selected file in Explorer, if you press twice quickly, a virtual viewer will open.

AI teknolojisindeki son gelişmelerden yararlanarak görüntüleri tanımlamaya yönelik bir eklenti. Explorer'da bir nesnenin veya seçilen dosyanın açıklamasını almak için NVDA+Control+I tuşlarına basın, hızlıca iki kez basarsanız sanal bir görüntüleyici açılır.

An extension for describing images by utilizing recent advances in AI technology. Press NVDA+Control+I to get a description of an object or selected file in Explorer, if you press twice quickly, a virtual viewer will open.

An extension for describing images by utilizing recent advances in AI technology. Press NVDA+Control+I to get a description of an object or selected file in Explorer, if you press twice quickly, a virtual viewer will open.
一個使用 AI 技術描述圖片的附加元件。 按下 NVDA+Control+I 來取得物件或檔案總管中選取的檔案之描述， 如果您快速按兩下，將開啟虛擬檢視視窗。
